recipesJson.name: Pineapple Rum Slush
recipesJson.author: besejuiced
recipesJson.description:
This recipe is like a hybrid juice, remove the 'WS-23' part and you get a gorgeous refreshing Piña Colada. Either way, you won't be disappointed.

FLV Jackfruit and VTA Sugarloaf Pineapple combined gives the most natural pineapple vaping experience I ever tasted.

No Pina Colada without rum, the SA White Rum used is perfect for this recipe as it is a soft tasting rum if used with the right % it adds a perfect boozy taste a pineapple recipe deserves.
I was planning to use VTA Light Rum but my supplier still not carries it or was not available on the creation date of this recipe.
VTA Light Rum, even so, I never tasted it, but seeing the reviews about it I can safely say that it can be subbed for the Solubarome Rum at the same %

FLV Sweet Coconut added for a background tropical sense.

The real secret for this juicy tropical combination is FA Candy/Jammy Wizard, it serves as the glue for the other ingredients softens the mix and gives that candy sweet sensation you would expect from a first-class cocktail.
WS-23 is used to get this Pineapple Rum a slush sensation.

As a sweet tooth, I added some CAP Super Sweet to round this off, this can be omitted at will.

Short steep time off 3 days, but if you are willing to wait till the 10-day mark, (FLV Sweet Coconut needs more days than the other ingredients to develop) this Pineapple Rum Slush/Piña Colada get even better.
